introduction: Axel Blake delivers his latest comedy special “IN STYLE”, a hilarious, honest and relatable performance sharing his journey to winning Britain’s Got Talent, as well as his experiences being a father, in a relationship, travelling and daily life adventures.Axel shares with humorous detail how he ended up on Britain’s Got Talent, the behind the scenes to the auditioning process and his very unique thought process as he made his way to the finals of the show. He then delves into how his life has changed since claiming the crown of the coveted competition and some of the stranger life experiences that have followed. The comic remains vividly relatable as he discusses some of the challenges of parenting his children and attempting to keep his partner happy.
